content: अंजि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> [अंज्-इन्] Unctuous, slimy; lubricated; shining, brilliant. --जिः {@--1@} A mark made with sandal &c. a Tilaka mark; रोहितांजिरनड्वान् <ls>Yaj.</ls> (रक्ततिलक). {@--2@} A commander, sender &c. --जिः --जी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} An ointment, pigment. {@--2@} Colour, hue. {@--3@} The sexual organ (?).
